text: The City of Fruita (pronounced /ˈfruːtə/) is a city located in western Mesa County, Colorado, United States. It is bordering Colorado River on the southern edge of town. The population was 13,395 at the 2020 census. It was incorporated in 1894. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Fruita official website Category:Cities in Colorado Category:1894 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in Colorado
title: Fruita, Colorado
